items.sentence: Tom put his foot on the first rung of the ladder.
Tom read a book while he was waiting for the bus.
Tom has made it clear that he wasn\'t interested.
Tom clearly doesn\'t understand French very well.
My grandfather lived to be ninety-nine years old.
She married him even though she didn\'t like him.
I don\'t speak French well enough to do that job.
I don\'t think Mary would ever leave her husband.
I don\'t think Tom is as stupid as he used to be.
Tom drove all night while Mary slept next to him.
